Typealiases.html#/s:13PusherChatkit8User.name: UserData
Typealiases.html#/s:13PusherChatkit8User.abstract: A dictionary of objects provided by the user and retrieved from the Chatkit web service.

Structs/User.html#/s:13PusherChatkit4Use.name: identifier
Structs/User.html#/s:13PusherChatkit4Use.abstract: The unique identifier for the user assigned by the Chatkit web service.

Structs/User.html#/s:13PusherChatkit4Use.name: name
Structs/User.html#/s:13PusherChatkit4Use.abstract: The human readable name of the user. This is not required to be unique.

Structs/User.html#/s:13PusherChatkit4Use.name: avatar
Structs/User.html#/s:13PusherChatkit4Use.abstract: The location represented as an URL of an avatar for the user.

Structs/User.html#/s:13PusherChatkit4Use.name: presenceState
Structs/User.html#/s:13PusherChatkit4Use.abstract: The current presence state of the user.

Structs/User.html#/s:13PusherChatkit4Use.name: userData
Structs/User.html#/s:13PusherChatkit4Use.abstract: The dictionary of arbitrary data which you may attach to the user.

Structs/User.html#/s:13PusherChatkit4Use.abstract: The Date at which the user was created.

Structs/User.html#/s:13PusherChatkit4Use.name: updatedAt
Structs/User.html#/s:13PusherChatkit4Use.abstract: The Date at which the user was last updated.

Structs/User.html#/s:13PusherChatkit4Use.name: hash(into:)
Structs/User.html#/s:13PusherChatkit4Use.abstract: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.
Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.
